Huffman Codes are: 
d 11111
r 111101
k 111100
m 11101
t 11100
n 1011
s 1010
i 100
a 001
f 0001
p 00001
  110
e 0100
u 00000
g 01010
c 01011
b 01100
o 01101
h 0111

The original string is:

i am pratik bhise and this is huffman encoding

The encoded string is:
10011000111101110000011111010011110010011110011001100011110010100100110001101111111110111000111100101011010010101100111000000001000111101001101111001001011010110110111111100101101010

The decoded string is:

i am pratik bhise and this is huffman encoding
